ISSUE.TITLE: Assets not in client/dist
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary Default static path is client/dist/, but the assets are not exported from client/app/assets/ resulting in 404 error. ### Technical details: * Redash Version: v1.0.1 * How did you install Redash: upgrade script
